item.title: Light does not work, 23rd October
item.description:
The light at the start of Frederick Terrace is faulty, this makes it difficult for the businesses nearby to operate, and also raises safety concerns for them too.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Frederick Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low & Dangerous Tree o/s No 39, 23rd October
item.description:
Resident reporting the tree o/s her property is leaning towards her front garden, railings & brick wall. Resident is very concerned about this especially as it has turned rainy & stormy weather. It is a health & safety issue . Please could someone look into this asap please. It is a big tree in a small bit of ground it has recently moved over a bit his concerns the resident in case it falls on anyone, needs to be checked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Elmcroft Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disloged stones, 23rd October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmbury Park, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting not working, 23rd October
item.description:

item.title: Bolt on gate has been damaged i, 23rd October
item.description:
